text: Neuburgia macroloba is a species of flowering plant in the family Loganiaceae. It is endemic to Fiji, where it is known only from the island of Taveuni. There are six known subpopulations with just a few individuals each. It grows in dense forest habitat.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Neuburgia macroloba. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998.
